# livePhotoVideoCodecType

**Instance Property**

The video codec to use for encoding the movie portion of Live Photo output.

## Declaration

```swift
var livePhotoVideoCodecType: AVVideoCodecType { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value must be one of the video codec types listed in the photo output’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/availableLivePhotoVideoCodecTypes] array.

## Configuring Live Photo settings

- **livePhotoMovieFileURL**: A URL at which to write Live Photo movie output.
- **livePhotoMovieMetadata**: A dictionary of metadata to include in the Live Photo movie file.
